description: A chrome extension to report disinformation
name: Totooba.info: Disinformation Reporting
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://hcaptcha.com https://*.hcaptcha.com/* 'unsafe-eval' https://hcaptcha.com https://*.hcaptcha.com; object-src 'self'; frame-src https://hcaptcha.com https://*.hcaptcha.com
